  • EdgeMaterial

Class EdgeMaterial

Configures the appearance of ViewObjects when their edges are emphasised.

Summary
  • Located at View.edgeMaterial.
  • Emphasise edges of a ViewObject by setting ViewObject.edges true.

Hierarchy

  • Component
    • EdgeMaterial

edgeAlpha

  • get edgeAlpha(): number
  • set edgeAlpha(value: number): void
    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/view/materials/EdgeMaterial.ts:148

    Gets edge transparency for {@link ViewObjects}.

    A value of 0.0 indicates fully transparent, 1.0 is fully opaque.

    Default value is 1.0.

    Returns number

    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/view/materials/EdgeMaterial.ts:133

    Sets edge transparency for {@link ViewObjects}.

    A value of 0.0 indicates fully transparent, 1.0 is fully opaque.

    Default value is 1.0.

    • Defined in packages/viewer/src/viewer/view/materials/EdgeMaterial.ts:75

    Gets which rendering modes in which to render edges.

    Accepted modes are QualityRender and FastRender.

    Default value is [QualityRender].
